title: Upgrade to VS2019 and .NET Core 3.0
body:
**Description of Change**

Updating the build system to Visual Studio 2019 and .NET Core 3.0

**Bugs Fixed**

None.

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
